mapper.select: SELECT tb_article.id, tb_article.author_id, tb_article.title, tb_article.category_id, tb_category.name AS category_name, DATE(date) AS create_date, TIME_FORMAT(date,'%H:%i:%S') AS create_time FROM tb_article, tb_category WHERE tb_article.category_id = tb_category.id AND tb_article.author_id = #{uid}
